io.delta.kernel.client

Interface JsonHandler


  • public interface JsonHandler
    Provides JSON handling functionality to Delta Kernel. Delta Kernel can use this client to parse JSON strings into Row. Connectors can leverage this interface to provide their best implementation of the JSON parsing capability to Delta Kernel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Row parseJson(java.lang.String json, StructType schema)
      Parse the given json string and return the requested fields in given schema as a Row.

    • Method Detail

      • parseJson

        Row parseJson(java.lang.String json,
              StructType schema)
        Parse the given json string and return the requested fields in given schema as a Row.
        Parameters:
        json - Valid JSON object in string format.
        schema - Schema of the data to return from the parse JSON. If any requested fields are missing in the JSON string, a null is returned for that particular field in returned Row. The type for each given field is expected to match the type in JSON.
        Returns:
